commands.name: index
commands.title: Show My Branch
commands.description: Template for showing a static list and a detail view

preferences.name: directory
preferences.title: Directory path
preferences.description: Specify a folder to save branch info

preferences.name: owner
preferences.title: Owner name
preferences.description: Please enter the owner name you will use

preferences.name: issueRepository
preferences.title: Often use issue repository
preferences.description: Please enter the repository name you use frequently

preferences.name: prRepository
preferences.title: Often use pull request repository
preferences.description: Please enter the pull request repository name you use frequently

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
